lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Beet supplies have dried up at Ipswich due to a combination of very wet weather, which has prevented most farmers in the factory's catchment area from harvesting, and last week's hurricane which blocked roads.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Despite the closure of Ipswich and the severe harvesting problems in other factory areas, British Sugar is maintaining its estimate of sugar production this campaign at around 1.2 mln tonnes, white value, against 1.34 mln last year, the spokesman said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Ipswich factory will remain closed until roads are cleared and supplies of beet build up again.
